NodeDeleted - Handle nodes deleted from the graph.

If the node being deleted is the current ISelPosition node, update ISelPosition.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/selectiondagisel-cpp/#l01186">1186</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/selectiondagisel-cpp">SelectionDAGISel.cpp</a>.
